ingredients: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and roughly chopped
1 lemongrass stalk, outer leaves removed and inner white stalk chopped roughly (or use 2 tsp lemongrass paste)
2cm piece ginger, peeled and roughly chopped
250g (approx 2) salmon fillet - they need to be skinless and boneless
2 tbsp vegetable oil - for brushing on the griddle/BBQ
